title: I am alarmingly good at Dark Star despite being in B5...

replies.body: I'm good at mario kart so why can't I drive in actual races
because it's a completely different game?
I mean, it's not, at all.
It really is. There's nothing involving your normal SR meta, no map awareness really required, no CS'ing, no wave control, etc.
Name 5 things that are the same as the normal game, and ability names don't count.
Perhaps you should be playing more thresh in ranked.

Erm.... Good for you? ...Congratulations? I guess?

It's not like it has any connection to the main game anyway. Most of the times what you need to climb in ELO is good decision making, this new gamemode requires zero for you to succeed.
give the man some credit, i mean, he is B5.

lol noob me B5 ONLY THROW 20 GAMES ADAY ME 
HAVENT WON ONE DARK STAR N00B

English.

I'm better than my gold boyfriend and a plat guy I played a few games with mechanically, game knowledge, map awareness and minion manipulation soooo...

> [{quoted}](name=Biabri,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uKgmxuGQ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-05-06T13:28:36.874+0000)
>
> English.
> 
> I'm better than my gold boyfriend and a plat guy I played a few games with mechanically, game knowledge, map awareness and minion manipulation soooo...

Maybe but it's hard for people to take that seriously when you are B5

Mostly though, this game mode is for fun. I don't think too many people take it that seriously

> [{quoted}](name=xJLx MCHammer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uKgmxuGQ,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-06T15:02:13.882+0000)
>
> Maybe but it's hard for people to take that seriously when you are B5
> 
> Mostly though, this game mode is for fun. I don't think too many people take it that seriously

Not my fault I'm dragged down by crappy teammates XD
"omg look at me I'm so good"
More a question as to why this is so. I dominate darkstar games, yet can't do the same in ranked games, should I not be higher?
Because the game mode is straight-forward?
Perhaps you're just stuck up and scared to give him credit? Get real, I've seen you bashing bronze players left and right. Yeah some great player you are... Act like it
He already gave himself credit. He believes he is good at that game mode and that's the only opinion that matters. However, he's asking the boards why he is doing well, and I'm expressing my opinion.
